game.name: Touhou Monster TD ~ 幻想乡妖怪塔防
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Easy to learn but hard to master, Touhou Monster TD is a unique Tower defense Game. Control your character, level up and unlock tower skills and character talents, use your wisdom to defeat incoming enemies. Travel the Gensokyo, find out why the “Incident” happened this time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Easy to learn but hard to master, Touhou Monster TD is a unique Tower defense Game. Control your character, level up and unlock tower skills and character talents, use your wisdom to defeat incoming enemies. Travel the Gensokyo, find out why the “Incident” happened this time.

reviewHighlights.text: 루나틱 스테이지 몇 개가 답도 없는 걸 제외하면, 전반적으로 재미있다. 챌린지 루나틱은 뭐 어떻게 깨라는 건지.........
왜 표시 안해놨는지 모르겠는데 한글패치 엄청 잘 되있음, 게임도 잘만들었고 재밌음 따봉을 드립니다.
